description:
Nearing completion and within walking distance to Clayton Plaza, Clayton station and Monash University, this architect-designed townhouse offers home buyers and investors a choice of floorplans and generous, well-appointed accommodation options with potential stamp duty savings and full builder’s guarantees.

These homes are only 800m away from Clayton Plaza for shopping and dining. It is also within 900m walk to Clayton Station, and an easy access to major bus terminal to Chadstone Shopping Centre, or M-City shopping, dining and cinema.

Within 20 mins walking distance to Monash University Clayton Campus, these homes also within easy access to Monash Medical Centre, children hospital and early learning centres.

Offering a 5-bedroom accommodation, this well-appointed townhouse includes herringbone parquetry timber floors, full climate control, streamlined kitchens with Caesarstone benchtops and stainless-steel appliances, stylish, fully-tiled bathrooms with walk-in showers and stone vanities, open plan living and dining with sliding glass doors opening to private landscaped courtyards and auto garages.

A quality, boutique development in a convenient, well-serviced location with high rental demand from students and young professionals, these townhouses have immense appeal for home-buyers as well as investors.
